channel.title: Comments on: The Wrapping of the Chair

item.title: By: Tory
item.dc:creator: Tory
item.description: Mel! I had no idea you were so full of mischief. MISCHIEFNESS!
item.content:encoded: Mel! I had no idea you were so full of mischief. MISCHIEFNESS!

item.title: By: Mel
item.dc:creator: Mel
item.description: Way back when, I worked for a grocery store. We had these giant rolls of industrial wrap as well. My husband and I once wrapped a friends car, in the blistering Florida heat, while said friend was working a 12 hour shift. We then covered the wrap with veggie oil so that you could not grip the wrap with too much ease. Ahhhh pranks. Glorious wrapping pranks :) I LOVE INDUSTRIAL WRAP AND ALL THOSE WHO USE IT WITH EVIL INTENTIONS :)
